attributes.action: Allow London kids free travel on buses while pending oyster replacement.
attributes.background: I am one of many London children who have lost their oyster. On many occasions i have been threatened by the bus driver to either get off the bus or he will call the police. Drivers should be made to allow all kids free travel in these circumstances and not up to their discretion.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
